p: 48 (64%) patients were referred for leukapheresis for autologous peripheral blood stem-cell collection ( appendix p 8). This procedure was successful (>2 × 10 6 CD34 + cells per kg) in 42 (88%) of the 48 patients, with a median of 6·75 × 10 6 CD34 + cells per kg (IQR 5–8). Autologous peripheral blood stem cells collected after a previous line of treatment and stem cells collected by marrow harvest were used in one patient each.
